ref: 10357 mōdayati ʻ mixes ʼ Dhātup., ʻ softens (with ghee) ʼ in Gilgit MSS. saktūn ghr̥tēna m˚ Raghu Vira (rather than ʻ augments ʼ with BHS ii 440). [√mud2]
L. (Ju.) mohaṇ ʻ to knead with oil or ghee ʼ,
A. moiba ʻ to soften or make juicy by mixing with water or other liquid ʼ;
H. monā ʻ to freshen, wet ʼ;
G. movũ ʻ to mix fat with flour ʼ. --
S. moiṇu ʻ to wring or twist a cloth &c. in rolling it in a lump ʼ? -- X mathāyáti q.v.
